name: Blast of Glory: Laser Weapon
description:
Pss... Want to get a super laser gun or a rifle absolutely free? Come here!

We have a lot of guns! You can even start a real war!

Amazing weapons, realistic sounds and light effects will change you into a real space trooper!
Take a cool photos with friends and share it everywhere. This simulator will be the best for you every day!

What you'll get:
- Tons of really cool weapons to feel adrenaline from the battle
- Powefull effects of explosions and shots
- Feel like a real trooper of special forces with a weapon in your hands
- Reload ammo! You don’t have to worry about bullets
- Become the best in battle with your friends!

It's extremely easy to play. Just take your laser weapon or rocket launcher and start shooting! Hold a phone or tablet in your hand and use it like you have a real guns.

Have fun!
